title: Queen Spider Staff
summaries: The Queen Spider Staff is a Hardmode sentry summon weapon. It can summon the Spider Turret sentry, which lasts for 10 minutes/ 2 minutes, remains stationary, and does not count against the player's minion capacity. The Spider Turret fires short-range Spider Eggs at enemies once per second, which can bounce, roll, and are heavily affected by gravity. The Spider Eggs deal no damage themselves, and upon colliding with enemies or after 1 second, they will break and spawn 2-4 Baby Spiders that attack enemies. The Baby Spiders will disappear upon hitting an enemy, dealing damage and inflicting Acid Venom debuff for 2–4 / 4–6 seconds. If there are no enemies within range, the Baby Spiders will persist for 5 seconds before vanishing.
The Spider Turret can be summoned in any area of the visible screen, even if blocks completely separate the player from the point chosen. It requires blocks or platforms to stand on.

Its best modifier is Ruthless. The Mythical modifier provides the widest array of stat bonuses, but these primarily affect the initial summon rather than the resulting minion. Additionally, minions cannot deal critical hits. The only lasting advantage a Mythical Queen Spider Staff has over a Ruthless one is knockback.
